summary: This is an email chain from October 19, 2007, discussing the selection of a special master's attorney representative in the Epstein case. It references a national news story about a lawsuit filed by a girl in New York, speculates that this is causing a delay in Epstein's guilty plea to deter other civil suits, and mentions that Epstein's camp planted false stories to discredit the girls. The emails also involve coordination about contacting the special master.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case and civil lawsuits; his group is concerned about the impact of a guilty plea on civil litigation.

persons.name: Jay
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who was supposed to send comments on a proposed letter but had not done so yet.

persons.name: Judge Davis
persons.context: The judge who may be contacted to ask about the status of the special master's selection decision.

connections.description: Jay appears to be part of Epstein's legal team or group, as he was to provide comments on a proposed letter related to the case.

events.title: National News Coverage of Lawsuit
events.description: A lawsuit filed by a girl in New York against Epstein made national news, being reported on Fox News and ABC News' website.

events.title: Delay in Epstein's Guilty Plea
events.description: Speculation that the guilty plea in Epstein's criminal case is being delayed because his group wants to first defeat the New York civil lawsuit to deter other potential suits.

events.title: False Stories Planted by Epstein's Camp
events.description: Newspapers reported that Epstein's camp planted false stories about girls who 'just sat in his kitchen' filing suit, in an attempt to discredit the accusers.

keyFacts: A lawsuit filed by a girl in New York against Epstein received national news coverage on October 19, 2007.
Epstein's group was concerned that a guilty plea in his criminal case would be used against him in civil suits, leading to a strategic delay to try to defeat the New York lawsuit first.
Epstein's camp was reported to have planted false stories about accusers to discredit them.
The email chain involves coordination about contacting a special master regarding the selection of an attorney representative, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
